frozen_definition.name: SitSmart
frozen_definition.signal_source: Posture app complaints of 'camera doesn't face me directly', 'only see front view', need solutions for varied office setups
frozen_definition.description: Phone-based posture trainer that works with any camera angle using AI to understand your specific setup and body position
frozen_definition.target_user: Remote workers with non-standard desk setups who can't use traditional posture apps due to camera positioning
frozen_definition.pain_point_evidence: Users report accuracy problems with 'camera off to the side' and apps that 'only see front view'
core_loop: Calibrate app to your specific desk setup
Get posture feedback adapted to your camera angle
frozen_definition.differentiation: Adaptive to non-standard setups vs. requiring perfect camera positioning
frozen_definition.subscription_fit: Premium includes multiple workspace profiles, detailed analytics, and ergonomic coaching

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic posture feedback, premium for multi-setup and coaching
